nodes.text: Star Wars: Battle Stations Activity Book and Model

Star Wars: Battle Stations Activity Book and Model is a canon children's activity set in the Star Wars Construction Books series. The set includes an activity book and miniature All Terrain Armored Transport paper model. It was written by Katrina Pallant and published by Egmont UK Ltd on June 2, 2016.
Insight Editions published an edition for the United States on October 6, 2020, titled Star Wars: Battle Stations Activity Book and Model Set.

Relive the greatest battles from the Star Wars original trilogy! Join the rebels for the Battle of Yavin as they destroy the evil Death Star, see the mighty Imperial walkers at the Battle of Hoth, and meet the cute Ewoks at the Battle of Endor. It includes complete mazes, codewords and puzzles in the uniquely illustrated, full colour activity book. Then press out the pieces to create your very own mini AT-AT model, perfect for recreating the famous Battle of Hoth scene from Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.
